# start(definition:)

**Type Method**

Creates and starts a game activity with a definition.

## Declaration

```swift
class func start(definition activityDefinition: GKGameActivityDefinition) throws -> GKGameActivity
```

## Creating an activity

- **init(definition:)**: Creates a game activity with definition.
- **start(definition:partyCode:)**: Creates and starts a new game activity with a custom party code.
